address: via di Mezzo 1, località Torre del Colle
description: Situated in a charming medieval village which is also home to a couple of small hotels, this attractive, rustic restaurant in an old olive mill acts as the backdrop for regional and Italian cuisine. Dishes with a touch of modern flavour are presented on a menu which, although not extensive, offers good value for money.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
